hero.headline: Create, Share & Collect Signatures
hero.subheadline: Professional form management made simple. Build forms from templates, share instantly, and track every signature.

features.title: Everything You Need for Digital Forms
features.subtitle: Streamline your workflow with powerful yet simple tools

template_based.title: Template-Based Creation
template_based.description: Choose from pre-built templates and customize them to your needs. No design skills required.

instant_sharing.title: Instant Public Links
instant_sharing.description: Generate shareable links in seconds. Recipients can sign forms without creating an account.

signature_collection.title: Secure Signatures
signature_collection.description: Collect digital signatures with full tracking. Know exactly who signed and when.

real_time_tracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
real_time_tracking.description: Monitor submissions as they happen. Access all your signed forms in one dashboard.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Get your forms signed in three simple steps

step1.title: Choose a Template
step1.description: Select from our library of professional form templates or start from scratch.

step2.title: Customize & Share
step2.description: Add your content, customize fields, and generate a public link to share with anyone.

step3.title: Collect & Track
step3.description: Recipients sign your form online. You get instant notifications and can track all submissions.

no_account.title: No Account Required for Signers
no_account.description: Your recipients don't need to sign up. Just share the link and they can sign immediately.

save_time.title: Save Time & Paper
save_time.description: Go digital. No more printing, scanning, or chasing signatures. Everything happens online.

organized.title: Stay Organized
organized.description: All your forms and submissions in one place. Search, filter, and export with ease.

compliant.title: Professional & Compliant
compliant.description: Built for businesses and organizations that need reliable, trackable form management.

final_cta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Forms?
final_cta.description: Join organizations already using Simple Forms to streamline their signature collection.
